title: AlarmStateChanged (Method)
text:
METHOD AlarmStateChanged : BOOL
This method will be called if a AlarmStateChangedListener was registered and the
alarm state changed.

rows.Name: AlarmStateChanged
rows.Comment:
<c>TRUE</c> in case the corresponding action to this event was successfull,
<c>FALSE</c> otherwise.

rows.Name: itfAlarm5
rows.Comment: The alarm which changed its state

rows: The old state the alarm went in
The new state to which the alarm changes

The AlarmStateTransition decribing how the alarm reached the new state
i.e. the way within the state graph
